content: this was made as a gift for my sister stephanie s wedding i fell in love with diane willett s knitted lace wedding garter 1 but couldn t seem to handle the size 00 needles that were required after a week of fighting with the slippery cotton thread i decided that i needed to design my own in crochet finish it off with a pretty crocheted flower - there are a lot of patterns on ravelry you can also try out the modified version and crochet only half of the pattern check out the projects for yourself 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/knitted-lace-wedding-garter
